task.summary: Added blog_post entity. Generated by script.

Added composite keys. Removed setter from them added contructors.
Started working with templates and created minimal controller.
Controller functions. Problem with framework folder.
Working with serializer. Bug in testing.
Improved author generator. Gotta fix encoding.
Improving post generator. Falta File y cleanUrl.
Modified blog_comment entity. It has two pk's now.
Modified blog_comment entity from original schema!. Now userId is a foreign key to blog_user. (not a pk). Id is pk and auto generated.
Created user generator. Gotta make comments.
Created comment generator. Gotta make replies.
Tag generator started. Gotta finish it.
Cant detect if the request if ajax.
Added Jquery. Gonna try with that.
Anda ajax con Jquery (en testing). Ahora hay q hacer el loading screen...
Tried to implement status private member. Not working. Gonna try the process bundle of symfony.
Symfony process component only works with unix commands. Theres also a progress bar i might try.
